title: Counter-Strike 1.6 BadMan [ Destroy all Anti Terrors ]
description:
Counter-Strike 1.6 BadMan , a modification of Counter-Strike 1.6 with a lot of modification and adjustments for a high fps and to be good played . In this version was added a new highly protection for slowhack methods ! Now your files are safe and you will can play without any problems ! This modification is unpacking original files on game startup , so all slowhack methods are blocked ! 

A short history of Counter-Strike 1.6 :
 Is one of the best F P S game in the history and the most was the most played game and is played and in our days ! The game have only one rule tero must to plant the bomb , counter-terrorists must to defuse it or to kill al tero .

The modifications which was made on this game are : 
 - The size of the archive , just 223MB HDD space , more less than other client game s! 
 - The skins of the weapons was modified for a better experience and for a good game 
 - There is no redirect , all is default , you can select your server on which 
you want to play 
 - The internet server list is updated weekly 
 - Guard against slowhack protection , such as commands send by the server or any miscelaneous files 
 - Three game launchers Counter-Strike.bat , Counter-Strike 1.6.vbs and Counter-
Strike 1.6.exe , all of this run the game and was written in 2 programming laguages . 
 - 100% more faster than other client game kits 
 - 100% you will have a higher FPS and on the worst pc 
 - The game comes with the latest bots 

ScreenShot : http://i.imgur.com/bGlyF4w.jpg
